name: Singularity Genesis
description:
NANA SAFIANA, 2021

Healing is a messy journey, but it’s fruitful. An inspiration came out during MCO 3, 30 days alone in a confined space were mostly in static physically but there was a lot of things going on in the mind, psychologically. There were days where I found myself travelling through my bank of memories and ideations jumped into a creation of vast possibilities of the future, but where and when will it end? How does my brain evolve through this period of time where so many activities are prohibited until further notice? What is going on in the mind when there are limited channels for us to express? I became anxious and depressed as it is easy for human to be distracted by social technology where our realities are being exploited and manipulated unconsciously, affecting our controlled surrounding. Our brains are constantly being wired based on screen views with things of the past and the present situation that is happening around the world. Through this project, I found a way to channel out the stuck energy within me onto canvas - a collection of mixed media through my daily confined encounter, a healing journey, layers of ‘time’ to achieve singularity on the canvas. 

Please visit www.pinktank.art for more information.
